pageContent: Purpose: This study compares the side effects of active surveillance, prostatectomy, radiation with or without adjuvant endocrine therapy, watchful waiting, and palliative therapy on patient-reported outcomes in a nationwide, population-based cohort of Danish men with prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Paraneoplastic syndromes in prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21139643/
